lexUnit.definition: in spite of the fact that

sentence.text: Winston Smith , his chin nuzzled into his breast in an effort to escape the vile wind , slipped quickly through the glass doors of Victory Mansions , though not quickly enough to prevent a swirl of gritty dust from entering along with him .
Winston turned a switch and the voice sank somewhat , though the words were still distinguishable .
